name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-todays-lunch
title: Today's Lunch Adaptive Card Extension
shortDescription: Adaptive Card Extension that shows today's lunch.
longDescription: Adaptive Card Extension that shows the lunch menu for the current day using a SharePoint List and PnPJs

references.name: Viva Connections Extensibility guidance
references.description: Adaptive Card Extensions are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page.
